questions.question: How can I check my order status?
questions.response: To check your order status, please provide your order number or the email address you used for the purchase. I'll be happy to look up the details for you and provide an update on your order.

questions.question: I need help with my order
questions.response: I'd be happy to help you with your order! Could you please provide your order number or the email address you used for the purchase? This will help me access your order details and assist you better.

questions.question: Can I cancel my order?
questions.response: Order cancellation depends on the status of your order. Digital items are typically delivered instantly, making cancellation difficult. However, if your order hasn't been processed yet, we may be able to help. Please provide your order number for assistance.

questions.question: I didn't receive order confirmation

questions.question: I'm having payment issues
questions.response: For payment issues, please check if your payment method is valid and has sufficient funds. If the problem persists, please share your order details and I'll investigate further. Common issues include expired cards or insufficient funds.

questions.question: Billing and invoice questions
questions.response: For billing and invoice questions, please provide your order number or email address. I can help you with invoice requests, billing disputes, or any other billing-related concerns.

questions.question: What is your refund policy?
questions.response: Our refund policy allows returns within 7 days of purchase for unused items. Digital items are non-refundable once delivered. Please provide your order number and reason for return, and I'll process your request according to our policy.

questions.question: How long does delivery take?
questions.response: Delivery times vary by product type. Digital items (game keys, top-ups) are delivered instantly via email or account activation. Physical items take 3-7 business days depending on your location. What type of product are you inquiring about?

questions.question: How do I receive my order?
questions.response: Digital items are delivered via email or direct account activation. You'll receive an email with your game key or top-up code, or we'll activate it directly on your gaming account. Physical items are shipped to your provided address.

questions.question: I haven't received my order
questions.response: If you haven't received your order, please check your email (including spam folder) for digital items. For physical items, I can help track your shipment. Please provide your order number so I can assist you further.

questions.question: I'm experiencing technical problems
questions.response: I understand you're experiencing technical difficulties. Could you please describe the specific issue you're encountering? This will help me provide a more targeted solution. Common issues include website loading problems or payment processing errors.

questions.question: My game key is not working
questions.response: If your game key isn't working, please check that you've entered it correctly without extra spaces. Some keys are region-specific or have activation requirements. Please provide your order number and I'll help you resolve this issue.

questions.question: Top-up not appearing in my account
questions.response: If your top-up isn't appearing in your account, please allow a few minutes for processing. Some games require a restart or refresh. If the issue persists, please provide your order number and I'll investigate the problem.

questions.question: Website is not loading properly
questions.response: If our website isn't loading properly, try refreshing the page or clearing your browser cache. If the problem continues, please let me know what specific error you're seeing and I'll help you resolve it.

questions.question: Tell me about your products
questions.response: We offer a wide range of digital gaming products including game keys for popular titles, top-up cards for mobile games, and in-game currency. All our products are authentic and come with instant delivery. What specific product are you interested in?

questions.question: Pricing and cost questions
questions.response: Our prices are competitive and updated regularly. If you're seeing a different price than expected, please refresh the page or let me know the specific product you're interested in. We also offer discounts and special deals regularly.

questions.question: Is a product available?
questions.response: To check product availability, please let me know which specific product you're interested in. Our inventory is updated in real-time, and I can help you find alternatives if your preferred item is out of stock.

questions.question: Will this work with my device/game?
questions.response: Product compatibility depends on the specific item and your device/game. Please let me know which product you're interested in and your device/game details, and I'll help you determine compatibility.

questions.question: Is it safe to buy from you?
questions.response: Yes, it's completely safe to buy from us! We use industry-standard SSL encryption to protect your payment information. We never store your credit card details, and all transactions are processed through secure payment gateways.

questions.question: How do you protect my privacy?
questions.response: We take your privacy seriously. We only collect information necessary for order processing and never share your personal data with third parties. Our privacy policy outlines how we protect and use your information.

questions.question: Account security questions
questions.response: Your account security is important to us. We use secure authentication and never ask for sensitive information through chat. If you have security concerns, please contact us through official channels.

questions.question: What deals are currently available?
questions.response: We regularly offer exciting deals and promotions! Currently, we have summer sales, bonus top-ups, and special discounts on game keys. Check our homepage for the latest offers, or let me know what you're looking for!

questions.question: Do you have coupon codes?
questions.response: Yes! We offer various coupon codes and promotional discounts. These are typically announced on our website, social media, or through our newsletter. Let me know what you're purchasing and I can check for available discounts.

questions.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
questions.response: We're working on implementing a loyalty program! Currently, we offer regular promotions and special deals for our customers. Stay tuned for updates on our loyalty rewards system.
